name: Mew Dungeon Of Wonders
description:
Known bugs:

1)When you die, dont press return to tile screen.

2) Dont press any buttons or keys on the splash screen. You might accidentally skip the main menu.

A 2D rotating platform pixel cat game with 5 unique levels and packed with adventures and cuteness. Make your way deep into the dungeon and save princess meow. Find a key in each room to make your way to the next level.

Made for PC windows with game controller support

This our first game jam and most of the art is drawn and animated. We are all beginner game devs.  The start menu and last level wasn't working on the last hour. Thank god we fixed it and submit by miracle. Our music guy didnt do anything, moral support guy didnt show, one game dev left due to stress, one guy spent the whole jam working on the menu. I spent all night with only few hours of sleep working on the art and help others with codings. I like to make a special thanks to Sake0706. He has been a great help.

Credits go to:

PixiTales: Game dev, artist

Sake0706: Game dev

HT-Kuzan: Game dev

Assets used: Dotween, Kenny UI,  GT-K, Game music pack,  and Opengameart for sfx.

You can find me on twitter or deviantart
